title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 153.6 - Special storage provisions at all terminals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 153.6 - Special storage provisions at all terminals

State Regulations

The Canal Corporation may issue special storage permits
when, in its opinion, the circumstances are such that it is impractical to
apply the general regulations. Such permits will be issued pursuant to Part 156
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
153.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
